author: Source: Somerset County Gazette
title: Lucky loser Johanna Konta cruises past Annika Beck to claim 50th win... - Somerset County Gazette
text:
British number one Johanna Konta extended her excellent end-of-season form by thrashing Germany's Annika Beck at the Linz Open. Konta was beaten in qualifying by Klara Koukalova, her first defeat to a lower-ranked opponent since May, but the Briton was handed a lucky loser spot in Austria to meet Beck in the first round.
 Somerset County Gazette.
